mapper.update: update report set RP_del='Y' where RP_num=#{RP_num}
mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select r.*, m.MB_nickName, c.CP_del from report r inner join member m on r.MB_numR=m.MB_num inner join carpool c on r.CP_num=c.CP_num order by r.RP_num desc) a) where rn between 1 and 6
